invocations.description: Returns true if the item with id itemid can be found at position x:posx, y:posy, z:posz, false otherwise.
invocations.ex:
if not isitemontile(3031, $posx, $posy, $posz) then
	moveitems(3031, 'ground')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will throw all your 'gold coins' in to the ground if there isn't any 'gold coins' in that location.
